question: The "Moucha Island" is located in which country?
explanation: Moucha Island is located in Djibouti. This island is a coastal island located at the centre of the Gulf of Tadjourah off the Djiboutian coast. This island was under the British occupation from 1840 to 1887. This is the largest island of Djibouti which is also surrounded by the Maskali Islands. It is a major service and tourism hotspot of Djibouti.
